fields_of_interest: Trade, Energy, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Structural reform of the European energy, gas, carbon and fuel markets
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
We conduct our business in accordance with the mission of Energa Group, which is to improve the quality of life and work of our customers. We strive to create an efficient and compact Group, flexibly adapting to the market conditions, that is: 
 
- venture with a low risk profile and secure financial ratios, 
- to be preferred and reliable supplier of energy, 
- to be efficient environmentally friendly energy producer.
